item.description:
After everyone gathers at Sandy's Chris with his husky Kodiak will lead the group by car to the actual trail head, as it will be easier to find this way.

8/3/12

As people are talking about not wanting to do a longer hike and having an option of cutting their hike shorter they should bring a map with them so they will know how to get back to the starting point. Here are 2 links that one could download and print out a map from.  Please note that the starting point of the hike is not at the Audubon Center.

http://www.nhaudubon.org/wp-content/uploads/brochures/MACMapColor.pdf
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a group of people with dogs.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Trails Near Lake Massabesic
